Class ParserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParserInterface

  • public class ParserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Seth Moudry, Benjamin Michaels, Levi King Interface to reduce coupling between the parser components. All calls pass through this interface

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ParserInterface()

      Appends a string to the log in the file choose panel

      Empties the filehandler file pool, clears the view panel

      Returns the current size of the file pool
      static void parseExampleFile()
      Uses Apache POI to get text from a doc or docx file
      static void reloadFile()
      Reloads the original unedited version of the file
      static void skipFile()
      Skips the current file, loads the next in the View Panel Moves beginning file to the end of the queue
      static void undoLast()
      Undoes the last edit in the parser

      Wraps the text selection in the chosen HTML tag
